section.name: How can I contribute to Doelan?
section.p: Doelan is a free software project. Everybody is encouraged to contribute to Doelan. There are lots of ways in which you can help to continue Doelan:

ul.li: Submitting bug reports to the mailing list
Send your TestSuites (with comments) to the developer to publish it on the website

section.p: There are several places to look for more information if you want to get involved in the development. The first step is to subscribe to the mailing list. You will soon see something that can be improved or added.

section.name: How do I commit a bug report?
section.p: There is actualy no automatic bug tracking system available like Bugzilla for Doelan. So, to report a bug, you must send your report on the mailing-list.

section.name: Publish TestTuites and plugins on Doelan website
section.p: We can post on the mailing-lists your TestSuite suggestions for publication on website. For the pluggins, please contact the developer without sending your plugin in attachment.
